meanings.definition: Occurring or produced every two weeks
meanings.sent1: The fortnightly meeting of the club always falls on a Thursday.
meanings.sent2: She set a reminder for the fortnightly trash collection.
meanings.sent3: The fortnightly rainfall seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The plants in the garden grew in a rhythmic fortnightly dance.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's fortnightly quizzes kept the students on their toes.

meanings.definition: Publications that are issued every two weeks
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading the fortnightlies for the latest news updates.
meanings.sent2: The library receives new fortnightlies every other Monday.
meanings.sent3: The stack of fortnightlies on the coffee table was growing taller.
meanings.sent4: Her love for the fortnightlies was evident in her extensive collection.
meanings.sent5: The office subscribed to several fortnightlies to stay informed.
